AcceptInvitation.name: AcceptInvitation
AcceptInvitation.description: Grants permission to accept invitations to become a GuardDuty member account

ArchiveFindings.name: ArchiveFindings
ArchiveFindings.description: Grants permission to archive GuardDuty findings

CreateDetector.name: CreateDetector
CreateDetector.description: Grants permission to create a detector

CreateFilter.name: CreateFilter
CreateFilter.description:
Grants permission to create GuardDuty filters. A filters defines finding attributes
                                                and conditions used to filter findings

CreateIPSet.name: CreateIPSet
CreateIPSet.description: Grants permission to create an IPSet

CreateMembers.name: CreateMembers
CreateMembers.description:
Grants permission to create GuardDuty member accounts, where the account used to create
                                                a member becomes the GuardDuty administrator account

CreatePublishingDestination.name: CreatePublishingDestination
CreatePublishingDestination.description: Grants permission to create a publishing destination

CreateSampleFindings.name: CreateSampleFindings
CreateSampleFindings.description: Grants permission to create sample findings

CreateThreatIntelSet.name: CreateThreatIntelSet
CreateThreatIntelSet.description:
Grants permission to create GuardDuty ThreatIntelSets, where a ThreatIntelSet consists
                                                of known malicious IP addresses used by GuardDuty to generate findings

DeclineInvitations.name: DeclineInvitations
DeclineInvitations.description: Grants permission to decline invitations to become a GuardDuty member account

DeleteDetector.name: DeleteDetector
DeleteDetector.description: Grants permission to delete GuardDuty detectors

DeleteFilter.name: DeleteFilter
DeleteFilter.description: Grants permission to delete GuardDuty filters

DeleteIPSet.name: DeleteIPSet
DeleteIPSet.description: Grants permission to delete GuardDuty IPSets

DeleteInvitations.name: DeleteInvitations
DeleteInvitations.description: Grants permission to delete invitations to become a GuardDuty member account

DeleteMembers.name: DeleteMembers
DeleteMembers.description: Grants permission to delete GuardDuty member accounts

DeletePublishingDestination.name: DeletePublishingDestination
DeletePublishingDestination.description: Grants permission to delete a publishing destination

DeleteThreatIntelSet.name: DeleteThreatIntelSet
DeleteThreatIntelSet.description: Grants permission to delete GuardDuty ThreatIntelSets

DescribeOrganizationConfiguration.name: DescribeOrganizationConfiguration
DescribeOrganizationConfiguration.description:
Grants permission to retrieve details about the delegated administrator associated
                                                with a GuardDuty detector

DescribePublishingDestination.name: DescribePublishingDestination
DescribePublishingDestination.description: Grants permission to retrieve details about a publishing destination

DisableOrganizationAdminAccount.name: DisableOrganizationAdminAccount
DisableOrganizationAdminAccount.description: Grants permission to disable the organization delegated administrator for GuardDuty

DisassociateFromMasterAccount.name: DisassociateFromMasterAccount
DisassociateFromMasterAccount.description:
Grants permission to disassociate a GuardDuty member account from its GuardDuty master
                                                account

DisassociateMembers.name: DisassociateMembers
DisassociateMembers.description:
Grants permission to disassociate GuardDuty member accounts from their master GuardDuty
                                                account

EnableOrganizationAdminAccount.name: EnableOrganizationAdminAccount
EnableOrganizationAdminAccount.description: Grants permission to enable an organization delegated administrator for GuardDuty

GetDetector.name: GetDetector
GetDetector.description: Grants permission to retrieve GuardDuty detectors

GetFilter.name: GetFilter
GetFilter.description: Grants permission to retrieve GuardDuty filters

GetFindings.name: GetFindings
GetFindings.description: Grants permission to retrieve GuardDuty findings

GetFindingsStatistics.name: GetFindingsStatistics
GetFindingsStatistics.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of GuardDuty finding statistics

GetIPSet.name: GetIPSet
GetIPSet.description: Grants permsission to retrieve GuardDuty IPSets

GetInvitationsCount.name: GetInvitationsCount
GetInvitationsCount.description:
Grants permission to retrieve the count of all GuardDuty invitations sent to a specified
                                                account, which does not include the accepted invitation

GetMasterAccount.name: GetMasterAccount
GetMasterAccount.description:
Grants permission to retrieve details of the GuardDuty master account associated with
                                                a member account

GetMembers.name: GetMembers
GetMembers.description: Grants permission to retrieve the member accounts associated with a master account

GetThreatIntelSet.name: GetThreatIntelSet
GetThreatIntelSet.description: Grants permission to retrieve GuardDuty ThreatIntelSets

InviteMembers.name: InviteMembers
InviteMembers.description:
Grants permission to invite other AWS accounts to enable GuardDuty and become GuardDuty
                                                member accounts

ListDetectors.name: ListDetectors
ListDetectors.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of GuardDuty detectors

ListFilters.name: ListFilters
ListFilters.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of GuardDuty filters

ListFindings.name: ListFindings
ListFindings.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of GuardDuty findings

ListIPSets.name: ListIPSets
ListIPSets.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of GuardDuty IPSets

ListInvitations.name: ListInvitations
ListInvitations.description:
Grants permission to retrieve a lists of all of the GuardDuty membership invitations
                                                that were sent to an AWS account

ListMembers.name: ListMembers
ListMembers.description:
Grants permission to retrierve a lsit of GuardDuty member accounts associated with
                                                a master account

ListOrganizationAdminAccounts.name: ListOrganizationAdminAccounts
ListOrganizationAdminAccounts.description:
Grants permission to list details about the organization delegated administrator for
                                                GuardDuty

ListPublishingDestinations.name: ListPublishingDestinations
ListPublishingDestinations.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of publishing destinations

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of tags associated with a GuardDuty resource

ListThreatIntelSets.name: ListThreatIntelSets
ListThreatIntelSets.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of GuardDuty ThreatIntelSets

StartMonitoringMembers.name: StartMonitoringMembers
StartMonitoringMembers.description:
Grants permission to a GuardDuty administrator account to monitor findings from GuardDuty
                                                member accounts

StopMonitoringMembers.name: StopMonitoringMembers
StopMonitoringMembers.description: Grants permission to disable monitoring findings from member accounts

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to add tags to a GuardDuty resource

UnarchiveFindings.name: UnarchiveFindings
UnarchiveFindings.description: Grants permission to unarchive GuardDuty findings

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove tags from a GuardDuty resource

UpdateDetector.name: UpdateDetector
UpdateDetector.description: Grants permission to update GuardDuty detectors

UpdateFilter.name: UpdateFilter
UpdateFilter.description: Grants permission to updates GuardDuty filters

UpdateFindingsFeedback.name: UpdateFindingsFeedback
UpdateFindingsFeedback.description:
Grants permission to update findings feedback to mark GuardDuty findings as useful
                                                or not useful

UpdateIPSet.name: UpdateIPSet
UpdateIPSet.description: Grants permission to update GuardDuty IPSets

UpdateOrganizationConfiguration.name: UpdateOrganizationConfiguration
UpdateOrganizationConfiguration.description:
Grants permission to update the delegated administrator configuration associated with
                                                a GuardDuty detector

UpdatePublishingDestination.name: UpdatePublishingDestination
UpdatePublishingDestination.description: Grants permission to update a publishing destination

UpdateThreatIntelSet.name: UpdateThreatIntelSet
UpdateThreatIntelSet.description: Grants permission to updates the GuardDuty ThreatIntelSets
